title: 2.3 The Black Pill
description:
Off the grid, white rabbit, the passenger swap.

Visit passengerlist.org to see a script and full list of credits for “The Black Pill,” and join the investigation.

Passenger List Season 2 was created and directed by John Scott Dryden; sound designed by Steve Bond; with music by Mark Henry Phillips. “The Black Pill” was written by Lauren Shippen. Passenger List is a proud member of Radiotopia, from PRX.

KAITLIN - Kelly Marie Tran
RORY - Ben Daniels
MIKE - Eric Meyers
SCOTTY - Christopher Ragland
ALEX - Akie Kotabe
KYLE – Eric Sirakian

OTHER VOICES:
Laurel Lefkow, Jennifer Armour, Raad Rawi, Munirih Grace, David Menkin, Danielle Lewis, Clare Corbett, Kerry Shale, Gianna Kiehl, Chris Kelly, Lauren Shippen, Merk Nguyen.
itunes:subtitle: Off the grid, white rabbit, the passenger swap.
author: info@radiotopia.fm (Passenger List and Radiotopia)
